iti16:2.1: “Sekhassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno appattamanasassa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamanassa viharato ajjhattikam anganti karitva nannam ekangampi samanupassami yam evam bahupakaram yathayidam, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikaro.
iti16:2.2: Yoniso, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasi karonto akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti”ti.
iti16:4.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
